We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list. Class MemberAccessNode. No method details beyond __init__, __repr__ standard. So we infer purpose: likely part of AST for parsing member access (e.g., object.property). So class responsibility: represent a node in abstract syntax tree that accesses a member of an object. Holds reference to object expression and member name. Business intent: to model member access in code analysis, compilation, or interpretation. Keywords: AST, member access, node, expression, property, field, parsing, compiler, interpreter.

Let's craft summary: "Represents a member access operation in an abstract syntax tree, encapsulating the target object and the accessed member." Business intent: "Enable parsing, analysis, or transformation of code that includes attribute or field access, supporting compilers, interpreters, or static analysis tools." Keywords list.
